techmeme.title: Sources: Apple may add a second camera to the next iPhone Air, possibly set for spring 2027 release alongside the iPhone 18 and 18e, to address user complaints (The Information)

Asahi says shipment levels are at just 10% of normal after a cyberattack in early October, and it is processing orders manually, ahead of a busy December period (Bloomberg)
A Munich court sides with Germany's music rights society GEMA in a case against OpenAI, saying OpenAI can't use song lyrics without a license; OpenAI can appeal (Reuters)
Apple and Japanese fashion house Issey Miyake launch the $150 iPhone Pocket, a 3D-knitted fabric accessory, its first fashion collaboration since Hermès in 2015 (Vogue)
